backout_plan:
Roll back the server from VM snap shot 
 Need to co-ordinate with VMware team to roll back the server from snapshot 
 Roll back the server for Physical Server, Boot with old kernel or Remove installed packages
description:
FY19 Monthly Linux Patching Required by EIP Standards. 
 For Application CI's refer to Affected CI Tab.
short_description: FY19 R1 patching on Archimedes (ARC) servers Total 06
implementation_plan:
The standard patching playbook / Application specific playbook is attached. Please find below steps. 
 1. Gather all the application teams on the bridge. 
 2. Coordinating with application team to bring down services and take confirmation from them to proceed with the patching 
 3. Patch and reboot the servers. 
 4. Application team will bring the services and we will complete the patching
outage_business_impact:
What is the user/business impact? 
 We will be doing Patching in rolling manner so no impact
test_plan:
RHEL 5.X/6.x/7.x servers: This is standard documented process we are following across all environments. 
 We have completed successfully in lower environment. Example: LEMR00051011. 
 Login to Ansible server dtl01lnxap01a and run the Patching ansible playbook. 
 Validate the result by using below command. 
 $sudo yum update
validation_plan:
RHEL 5.X/6.x/7.x servers: 
 Verifying if all available security patches are upgraded:

The standard patching playbook / Application specific playbook is attached. Please find below steps. 
 1. Gather all the application teams on the bridge.
